title: TIL remakes count as loss for placement

replies.body:
Hey Thomyork,

I'm one of the devs that worked on remake.  Just so you know, the calculation for placing you doesn't take the remake game into account.  That's probably a lingering visual issue that we'll hopefully fix soon.  As a data point for me, what area of the client was it showing up as as a loss?
I can't speak for him but I remember checking my win rate for a champion and it took the loss into account after remaking. Hope I helped!

I think I heard that once before, but am unable to confirm it. The best thing I can do is recommend submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to try and get clarification on how remakes (caused by other people) affect your placements.
